hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Dharr that he heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say:“Whoever claims something that does not belong to him; he is not one of us, so let him take his place in Hell.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنِ ادَّعَى مَا لَيْسَ لَهُ وَخَاصَمَ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: One Who Claims Something Does Not Belong To Him And Disputes About It
